content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (15.5, 70.5)
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) facing DOWN
- Output chest at (15.5, 72.5)
- Connected to small electric pole at (17.5, 69.5)
- Currently not powered (status: NO_POWER)

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (-46.5, 70.5)
- Electric mining drill at (-46.5, 70.5) facing DOWN
- Output chest at (-46.5, 72.5)
- Connected to small electric pole at (-44.5, 69.5)
- Currently not powered (status: NO_POWER)

### Power Generation System
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) with water output
- Water pipe network extending to (27.5, 66.5)
- Boiler at (19.0, 69.5) facing RIGHT with:
  - Water input at (18.5, 67.5) and (18.5, 71.5)
  - Steam output at (20.5, 69.5)
  - Currently burning coal (45 units)
- Steam engine at (23.5, 69.5) facing RIGHT
  - Currently not connected to boiler (status: NOT_CONNECTED)

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement Errors
- Cannot place entities on occupied tiles - always check position is clear before placing
- Cannot place entities too far from player - move within 10 tiles before placing

### Power System Errors
- Mining drills show "not receiving electricity" - ensure power poles connect to generators
- Steam engine shows "not connected to power network" - connect with power poles
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" - properly connect boiler output to engine input

### Fluid System Errors
- Failed to connect boiler to steam engine - ensure pipe connections align with connection points
- Boiler shows "no input liquid" - properly connect water source to boiler input
- Cannot access boiler fluid box directly - use proper fluid system inspection methods

### General Tips
- Verify entity connections before asserting operational status
- Check entity status and warnings before making assumptions
- Plan pipe routes carefully to avoid blocked paths
- Ensure proper spacing between entities to allow connections
